name: HowLovelyamI
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: how lovely am i
des: Alexa really does think that you're lovely, just ask her 'how lovely am I' for a reminder of how lovely you are. Ask her in the morning to start your day right, when you're feeling a bit low, or just whenever you need a little boost!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
